Vault</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 14px;">TFSEC</font></div></div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d0cee2;strokeColor=#56517e;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="750" y="-190" width="160" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-21" value="<font style="font-size: 22px;">Networking is common in Linux,AWS,Docker and K8s</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="870" width="550" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-22" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">File Storage in Linux called as NFS in aws we have EFS, Same way you can mount EFS to multiple pods in k8s</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-40" y="950" width="1010" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-23" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">In General Block Storage was used to install OS, Docker has volume concept and k8s also have volumes concept like pv</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-50" y="800" width="1090" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-25" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">1.3-tier application[app.konkas.tech---&gt;External ALB---&gt;Frontend---&gt;InternalALB---&gt;Backend---&gt;RDS]</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="1230" width="1460" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-27" value="<span style="background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 32px;">2. 3-tier single page application[spa.konkas.tech ---&gt; CloudFront ---&gt; S3 ---&gt; ALB ---&gt; ECS ---&gt; RDS]</font></span><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="1285" width="1450" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-29" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">3. Dockerizing 3-tier application and Roboshop</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="1350" width="690" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-31" value="<span style="font-size: 32px;">4. Deploy RoboShop On ECS Cluster</span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="1400" width="560" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-33" value="<font style="font-size: 32px;">5. Using GithubActions Create CI/CD pipeline to deploy RoboShop on ECS</span></div><div><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#10739e;fillColor=#b1ddf0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="1510" width="1090" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="L2iQRGnF9VsD0ROrTpiG-35" value="<div><span style="font-size: 32px;">7. div.font: File Storage in Linux called as NFS in aws we have EFS, Same way you can mount EFS to multiple pods in k8s

switch.text: File Storage in Linux called as NFS in aws we have EFS, Same way you can mount EFS to multiple pods in k8s

switch.text: In General Block Storage was used to install OS, Docker has volume concept and k8s also have volumes concept like pv
